org.apache.flink.core.fs

类 LimitedConnectionsFileSystem.OutStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • org.apache.flink.core.fs.FSDataOutputStream
        • org.apache.flink.core.fs.LimitedConnectionsFileSystem.OutStream
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, LimitedConnectionsFileSystem.StreamWithTimeout
    封闭类:
    LimitedConnectionsFileSystem

    private static final class LimitedConnectionsFileSystem.OutStream
extends FSDataOutputStream
implements LimitedConnectionsFileSystem.StreamWithTimeout
    A data output stream that wraps a given data output stream and un-registers from a given connection-limiting file system (via LimitedConnectionsFileSystem.unregisterOutputStream(OutStream) upon closing.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean closed
      Flag tracking whether the stream was already closed, for proper inactivity tracking.
      private LimitedConnectionsFileSystem fs
      The connection-limiting file system to un-register from.
      private FSDataOutputStream originalStream
      The original data output stream to write to.
      private LimitedConnectionsFileSystem.StreamProgressTracker progressTracker
      The progress tracker for this stream.
      private LimitedConnectionsFileSystem.StreamTimeoutException timeoutException
      An exception with which the stream has been externally closed.

      • getPos

        public long getPos()
            throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: FSDataOutputStream
        Gets the position of the stream (non-negative), defined as the number of bytes from the beginning of the file to the current writing position. The position corresponds to the zero-based index of the next byte that will be written.

        This method must report accurately report the current position of the stream. Various components of the high-availability and recovery logic rely on the accurate

        指定者:
        getPos 在接口中 LimitedConnectionsFileSystem.StreamWithTimeout
        指定者:
        getPos 在类中 FSDataOutputStream
        返回:
        The current position in the stream, defined as the number of bytes from the beginning of the file to the current writing position.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurs while obtaining the position from the stream implementation.

      • flush

        public void flush()
           throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: FSDataOutputStream
        Flushes the stream, writing any data currently buffered in stream implementation to the proper output stream. After this method has been called, the stream implementation must not hold onto any buffered data any more.

        A completed flush does not mean that the data is necessarily persistent. Data persistence can is only assumed after calls to FSDataOutputStream.close() or FSDataOutputStream.sync().

        Implementation note: This overrides the method defined in OutputStream as abstract to force implementations of the FSDataOutputStream to implement this method directly.

        指定者:
        flush 在接口中 java.io.Flushable
        指定者:
        flush 在类中 FSDataOutputStream
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurs while flushing the stream.

      • sync

        public void sync()
          throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: FSDataOutputStream
        Flushes the data all the way to the persistent non-volatile storage (for example disks). The method behaves similar to the fsync function, forcing all data to be persistent on the devices.
        指定者:
        sync 在类中 FSDataOutputStream
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurs

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: FSDataOutputStream
        Closes the output stream. After this method returns, the implementation must guarantee that all data written to the stream is persistent/visible, as defined in the class-level docs.

        The above implies that the method must block until persistence can be guaranteed. For example for distributed replicated file systems, the method must block until the replication quorum has been reached. If the calling thread is interrupted in the process, it must fail with an IOException to indicate that persistence cannot be guaranteed.

        If this method throws an exception, the data in the stream cannot be assumed to be persistent.

        Implementation note: This overrides the method defined in OutputStream as abstract to force implementations of the FSDataOutputStream to implement this method directly.

        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.io.Closeable
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.lang.AutoCloseable
        指定者:
        close 在类中 FSDataOutputStream
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if an error occurred while closing the stream or guaranteeing that the data is persistent.

      • closeDueToTimeout

                       throws java.io.IOException

        Closes the stream asynchronously with a special exception that indicates closing due to lack of progress.
